name: Who will thrive when were gone

metadata.name: WWTWWG Amur Leopard
metadata.description:
The Amur Leopard is the 1st art piece of our latest collection: "Who will thrive when we're gone?"

About The Collection:
The planet will survive us. But it will look very different when we're gone.
A collective of Artists and AI depict species threatened by humanity's impact on the planet, and pose the question: "Who will thrive when we're gone?"

If you think the latest NFT you bought is rare:
The Amur Leopard is Critically Endangered. There are only around 84 known individuals of their species left.



Note: we are offsetting the environmental impact of any blockchain transactions we make on this platform, and a large portion of our profits are donated towards species conservation efforts made by the WWF.
